DOC.brief_summary: This study design order evaluate compare efficacy safety aspirin clopidogrel patient low stroke risk Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Aspirin Clopidogrel Atrial Fibrillation With Low Moderate Stroke Risk
DOC.detailed_description: Efficacy outcome evaluate major cerebro-cardiovascular event include stroke , cardiovascular death , myocardial infarction 1 year-medication period . In addition , safety outcome evaluate gastrointestinal response include peptic ulcer upper gastrointestinal bleeding event study drug repeat gastroenteroscopic examination medication GI specialist .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Man Women > 20 year old 2. newly detect AF ( CHA2DS2VASc index score : 1 ) 3 . Patient need antiplatelet therapy use aspirin clopidogrel stroke prevention 4. volunteer 5. childbearing age woman take proper oral contraceptive 1 . No specific contraindication history hypersensitivity Clopidogrel aspirin 2 . Patient active GI bleeding bleeding tendency major bleed history 3. less 1 year residual expect life 4 . Pregnant breastfeed woman 5 . Other cause , determine charge physician 6 . Patient definite GERD need special treatment 7 . Patient need take NSAID ( NonSteroidal AntiInflammatory Drug ) 2 week
